mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, pay_url, market_type, market_deduction_amount, pay_amount from pay_order where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId} order by id desc limit 1
SELECT order_id as orderId FROM pay_order WHERE status = 'PAY_WAIT' AND NOW() >= order_time + INTERVAL 15 MINUTE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT order_id as orderId FROM pay_order WHERE status = 'PAY_WAIT' AND NOW() >= order_time + INTERVAL 1 MINUTE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10

select user_id, product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, pay_url, market_type, market_deduction_amount, pay_amount from pay_order where order_id = #{orderId} and status = #{status} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: insert into pay_order( user_id, product_id, product_name, order_id, order_time, total_amount, status, market_type, market_deduction_amount, pay_amount, create_time, update_time) values( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{marketType}, #{marketDeductionAmount}, #{payAmount}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update pay_order set status = 'DEAL_DONE', update_time = now() where order_id = #{orderId}
